CHAT.comment: SC and JE are in block area; some blocks have been set up as ramps and "roads"; SC and JE are walking on the structure

u.a: SC jumps again , lands near block table; starts playing with blocks
SC continues to play with blocks; JE jumps some more
both get ready to jump again
both get ready to jump again
SC comes over; goes to other mic; they both start examining them
notices other mic; JE and SC examine mics for about a minute in silence
JE and SC continue to jump; SC jumps out of area; JE follows
JE comes back into area; jumps around; JE approaches RS
AM enters area , approaches RS and JE
SC enters area; sits next to JE
SC and JE go back to jumping off blocks
they start to crawl under block table; RS approaches them
RS leaves; JE and SC come out
puts pillows down next to blocks
JE , SC and NI run into area
JE and NI lay on pillow inside block structure
gives SC the pillows; SC puts them inside
big pillow falls next to him
puts his face into pillow; continues to cry out; SC and NI imitate
JE leads SC and NI out of area
AM and SC enter area; AM starts walking on block structure; SC watches AM a while; SC leaves; JE , NI and SC enter area; JE and NI have paper swords
SC uses pillow to block AM's way as she tries to leave
SC leaves AM alone; jumps onto blocks
SC , JE , and NI jump around; AM leaves area
SC and JE pretend to sleep
holding up sword; SC and JE lay on pillows
all three begin to leave area
SC returns , NI and JE leave; after a minute , SC leaves
SA enters area; starts dancing on blocks; RS enters area; SA follows him over to equipment
SA goes to other side of room; grabs puzzle
TA and SA go to other side of room
LL and AM enter area , going directly to block table
holds them out; TA hands SA the cars
LL and AM get up to leave; SA follows them
JE , NI , SC and JL enter area; they fight nonverbally for about a minute , jumping from blocks , throwing pillows
NI jumps onto SC; JE jumps on top of NI
AM enters area , grabs TA's shirt
AM and TA leave; the boys start marching around blocks , jumping , etc
JE takes block and puts it on block structure; SI enters area
everybody marches off except SI; CO enters area
SI and CO continue to do summersaults
CO laughs; in background HE has been playing with figurines; SA enters area and starts taking them away
SA throws figurines; MA enters area , takes SA away; CO and SI watch all this intently; CO gets up to leave
CO stands on blocks , puts out hand
CO moves to other end of block structure , puts out hand
SI builds; CO wanders around; approaches HE
they play; talk too quietly to hear; SI almost falls while building
CO and HE look over; CO laughs
leaves; everybody plays quietly; CO and HE play with figurines SI approaches
SI asks some more questions quietly , acts silly; HE and CO laugh; SI moves around , takes some figurines
HE makes figurine slide down slide
CO makes figures slide down; SI gets up and leaves with figurines
HE makes figurine go down slide
girls play quietly; can't hear; SI approaches RS
SI talks to HE and CO; can't hear; approaches RS
SI goes to shelf; comes back; plays quietly
